Who is Tree House?

Located in Melbourne and Sydney, treehouse has produced and shot commercials, music videos, and digital content. We like to tell stories nicely. Our photographers are passionate artists who like to immerse the viewers with their work. We’re a fresh new approach among the market. We’ve worked with people like Honda, New Balance, Bic, Dymo, Cruiser, Asahi, Hassel, Lenovo, Lekker, Dell, Marley, Tho, Monash Uni to bring them an amazing finishing product.

Let's work together
